en_title: Secretary for Justice to attend arbitration forum in Guangzhou
zh_title: 律政司司長出席廣州仲裁論壇

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Guangzhou on Monday and Tuesday (September 18 and 19) and attend the 7th Greater China Arbitration Forum. He will give a speech at the opening ceremony.

Organised by the Guangzhou Arbitration Commission, the forum will discuss issues including the development of online arbitration, the practice of ad hoc arbitration, and the role and positioning of arbitration under the Belt and Road Initiative.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on September 19.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於星期一及星期二（九月十八及十九日）訪問廣州，出席第七屆大中華仲裁論壇，並於開幕式上致辭。
論壇由廣州仲裁委員會舉辦，討論議題包括網絡仲裁的發展、臨時仲裁的實踐，以及「一帶一路」倡議下仲裁的角色與定位。
袁國強將於九月十九日下午返港。

Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on September 19.
